SELECT SEATNO,REVTIME,LOC,COORDX,COORDY, CASE WHEN TBL_SEAT.STATUS=1 THEN 1 ELSE NVL(B.REVC,0) END STATUS FROM TBL_SEAT CROSS JOIN (SELECT ROWNUM REVTIME FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM<=12) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT SEATNO,REVTIME,LOC,count(*) REVC FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE TO_CHAR(REVDATE,'YYYYMMDD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY SEATNO,REVTIME,LOC) B USING(SEATNO,REVTIME,LOC) WHERE SEATNO>0
ORDER BY 1,2,3

SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')< 09 THEN 0 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=09 THEN 1 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=10 THEN 2 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=11 THEN 3 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=12 THEN 4 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=13 THEN 5 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=14 THEN 6 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=15 THEN 7 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=16 THEN 8 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=17 THEN 9 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=18 THEN 10 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=19 THEN 11 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')=20 THEN 12 WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24')>20 THEN 13 END TIME FROM DUAL
